biotools.summary:
Large-scale, harmonized FunctIonaL gEnomics Repository.

GIGGLE is a genomics search engine that identifies and ranks the significance of shared genomic loci between query features and thousands of genome interval files.

Database with the most comprehensive harmonized, extensible, indexed, searchable human functional genomics data collection.

Functional genomics repository (FILER) is a database developed by NIAGADS with the most comprehensive harmonized, extensible, indexed, searchable human functional genomics data collection across >20 data sources:.
